document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
  const pane = document.getElementById('diagram-pane');
  if (!pane) return;
  const svg = pane.querySelector('svg');
  const zoomLabel = document.getElementById('diagram-zoom-level');
  const zoomInBtn = document.getElementById('diagram-zoom-in');
  const zoomOutBtn = document.getElementById('diagram-zoom-out');
  const zoomResetBtn = document.getElementById('diagram-zoom-reset');
  if (!svg) { if (zoomLabel) zoomLabel.textContent = 'n/a'; return; }
  let zoom = 1.0;
  const minZoom = 0.30;
  const maxZoom = 3.00;
  const step = 0.10;
  function applyZoom() {
    svg.style.transformOrigin = 'top left';
    svg.style.transform = `scale(${zoom})`;
    if (zoomLabel) zoomLabel.textContent = `${Math.round(zoom * 100)}%`;
  }
  if (zoomInBtn) zoomInBtn.addEventListener('click', function () { zoom = Math.min(maxZoom, +(zoom + step).toFixed(2)); applyZoom(); });
  if (zoomOutBtn) zoomOutBtn.addEventListener('click', function () { zoom = Math.max(minZoom, +(zoom - step).toFixed(2)); applyZoom(); });
  if (zoomResetBtn) zoomResetBtn.addEventListener('click', function () { zoom = 1.0; applyZoom(); });
  applyZoom();
});
</script>
